pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PaneltimeAuthor: Espen SirnesVersion: 1.1.6This package integrates paneldata estimation with a very efficient ARIMA/GARCHestimator. ## InstallationUse standard "pip install paneltime" for installationFor compiling the custum clibrary (sparse matrix inversion):numpy (will be installed anyway, but required in advance for compilation of custom c-library)If you are NOT installing on Windows, make sure these requirements are satisfied before you install:## For GUI:Tkinter: From root, "apt python3-tk" in Linux## For matplotlib to be installed:pk-konfig: From root, "apt pk-konfig" in LinuxFreetype : From root, "apt install libfreetype6 libfreetype6-dev" in Linux)
